class Solution:
    def maxTotalReward(self, rewardValues: List[int]) -> int:
        nums = sorted(rewardValues)
        sums = 1
        res = 0
        for num in nums:
            mask = (1<<num) - 1
            sums = sums|((sums&mask)<<num)
            # print(bin(mask), bin(sums), num)
            # for prev in sums:
            #     if prev >= num: continue
            #     cur = prev + num
            #     if cur < nums[-1]:  newSums.add(cur)
            #     elif res < cur:   res = cur
            # sums = newSums
        return sums.bit_length()-1
